title: SUSHI Configuration Logical Model
description: Logical model defining the structure of sushi-config.yaml files used for FHIR Implementation Guide configuration. This model captures the essential metadata and configuration parameters needed for IG publishing.

resourceType.description: Resource type identifier for SushiConfigLogicalModel logical model

id.description: Unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.

canonical.description: Canonical URL for the IG, should match DAK publicationUrl (e.g., http://smart.who.int/trust)

license.description: License under which the IG is published, should match DAK license

copyrightYear.description: Year or year range for copyright, should match DAK

experimental.description: Whether this IG is experimental, should match DAK

releaseLabel.description: Label for this release (e.g., ci-build, draft, ballot)

publisher.description: Organization responsible for publishing the IG
